2400 
2401  vpOptimizableKFs.reserve(Nd);
2402  vpOptimizableKFs.push_back(pKF);
2403  pKF->mnBALocalForKF = pKF->mnId;
2404  for(int i=1; i<Nd; i++)
2405  {
2406  if(vpOptimizableKFs.back()->mPrevKF)
2407  {
2408  vpOptimizableKFs.push_back(vpOptimizableKFs.back()->mPrevKF);
2409  vpOptimizableKFs.back()->mnBALocalForKF = pKF->mnId;
2410  }
2411  else
2412  break;
2413  }
2414 
2415  int N = vpOptimizableKFs.size();
2416 
2417  // Optimizable points seen by temporal optimizable keyframes
2418  list<MapPoint*> lLocalMapPoints;
2419  for(int i=0; i<N; i++)
2420  {
2421  vector<MapPoint*> vpMPs = vpOptimizableKFs[i]->GetMapPointMatches();
2422  for(vector<MapPoint*>::iterator vit=vpMPs.begin(), vend=vpMPs.end(); vit!=vend; vit++)
2423  {
2424  MapPoint* pMP = *vit;
2425  if(pMP)
2426  if(!pMP->isBad())
2427  if(pMP->mnBALocalForKF!=pKF->mnId)
2428  {
2429  lLocalMapPoints.push_back(pMP);
2430  pMP->mnBALocalForKF=pKF->mnId;
2431  }
2432  }
2433  }
2434 
2435  // Fixed Keyframe: First frame previous KF to optimization window)
2436  list<KeyFrame*> lFixedKeyFrames;
2437  if(vpOptimizableKFs.back()->mPrevKF)
2438  {
2439  lFixedKeyFrames.push_back(vpOptimizableKFs.back()->mPrevKF);
2440  vpOptimizableKFs.back()->mPrevKF->mnBAFixedForKF=pKF->mnId;
2441  }
2442  else
2443  {
2444  vpOptimizableKFs.back()->mnBALocalForKF=0;
2445  vpOptimizableKFs.back()->mnBAFixedForKF=pKF->mnId;
2446  lFixedKeyFrames.push_back(vpOptimizableKFs.back());
2447  vpOptimizableKFs.pop_back();
2448  }
2449 
2450  // Optimizable visual KFs
2451  const int maxCovKF = 0;
2452  for(int i=0, iend=vpNeighsKFs.size(); i<iend; i++)
2453  {
2454  if(lpOptVisKFs.size() >= maxCovKF)
2455  break;
2456 
2457  KeyFrame* pKFi = vpNeighsKFs[i];
2458  if(pKFi->mnBALocalForKF == pKF->mnId || pKFi->mnBAFixedForKF == pKF->mnId)
2459  continue;
2460  pKFi->mnBALocalForKF = pKF->mnId;
2461  if(!pKFi->isBad() && pKFi->GetMap() == pCurrentMap)
2462  {
2463  lpOptVisKFs.push_back(pKFi);
2464 
2465  vector<MapPoint*> vpMPs = pKFi->GetMapPointMatches();
2466  for(vector<MapPoint*>::iterator vit=vpMPs.begin(), vend=vpMPs.end(); vit!=vend; vit++)
2467  {
2468  MapPoint* pMP = *vit;
2469  if(pMP)
2470  if(!pMP->isBad())
2471  if(pMP->mnBALocalForKF!=pKF->mnId)
2472  {
2473  lLocalMapPoints.push_back(pMP);
2474  pMP->mnBALocalForKF=pKF->mnId;
2475  }
2476  }
2477  }
2478  }
2479 
2480  // Fixed KFs which are not covisible optimizable
2481  const int maxFixKF = 200;
2482 
2483  for(list<MapPoint*>::iterator lit=lLocalMapPoints.begin(), lend=lLocalMapPoints.end(); lit!=lend; lit++)
2484  {
2485  map<KeyFrame*,tuple<int,int>> observations = (*lit)->GetObservations();
2486  for(map<KeyFrame*,tuple<int,int>>::iterator mit=observations.begin(), mend=observations.end(); mit!=mend; mit++)
2487  {
2488  KeyFrame* pKFi = mit->first;
2489 
2490  if(pKFi->mnBALocalForKF!=pKF->mnId && pKFi->mnBAFixedForKF!=pKF->mnId)
2491  {
2492  pKFi->mnBAFixedForKF=pKF->mnId;
2493  if(!pKFi->isBad())
2494  {
2495  lFixedKeyFrames.push_back(pKFi);
2496  break;
2497  }
2498  }
2499  }
2500  if(lFixedKeyFrames.size()>=maxFixKF)
2501  break;
2502  }
2503 
2504  bool bNonFixed = (lFixedKeyFrames.size() == 0);
2505 
2506  // Setup optimizer
2507  g2o::SparseOptimizer optimizer;
2508  g2o::BlockSolverX::LinearSolverType * linearSolver;
2509  linearSolver = new g2o::LinearSolverEigen<g2o::BlockSolverX::PoseMatrixType>();
2510 
2511  g2o::BlockSolverX * solver_ptr = new g2o::BlockSolverX(linearSolver);
2512 
2513  if(bLarge)
2514  {
2515  g2o::OptimizationAlgorithmLevenberg* solver = new g2o::OptimizationAlgorithmLevenberg(solver_ptr);
2516  solver->setUserLambdaInit(1e-2); // to avoid iterating for finding optimal lambda
2517  optimizer.setAlgorithm(solver);
2518  }
2519  else
2520  {
2521  g2o::OptimizationAlgorithmLevenberg* solver = new g2o::OptimizationAlgorithmLevenberg(solver_ptr);
2522  solver->setUserLambdaInit(1e0);
2523  optimizer.setAlgorithm(solver);
2524  }
2525 
2526 
2527  // Set Local temporal KeyFrame vertices
2528  N=vpOptimizableKFs.size();
2529  for(int i=0; i<N; i++)
2530  {
2531  KeyFrame* pKFi = vpOptimizableKFs[i];
2532 
2533  VertexPose * VP = new VertexPose(pKFi);
2534  VP->setId(pKFi->mnId);
2535  VP->setFixed(false);
2536  optimizer.addVertex(VP);
2537 
2538  if(pKFi->bImu)
2539  {
2540  VertexVelocity* VV = new VertexVelocity(pKFi);
2541  VV->setId(maxKFid+3*(pKFi->mnId)+1);
2542  VV->setFixed(false);
2543  optimizer.addVertex(VV);
2544  VertexGyroBias* VG = new VertexGyroBias(pKFi);
2545  VG->setId(maxKFid+3*(pKFi->mnId)+2);
2546  VG->setFixed(false);
2547  optimizer.addVertex(VG);
2548  VertexAccBias* VA = new VertexAccBias(pKFi);
2549  VA->setId(maxKFid+3*(pKFi->mnId)+3);
2550  VA->setFixed(false);
2551  optimizer.addVertex(VA);
2552  }
2553  }
2554 
2555  // Set Local visual KeyFrame vertices
2556  for(list<KeyFrame*>::iterator it=lpOptVisKFs.begin(), itEnd = lpOptVisKFs.end(); it!=itEnd; it++)
2557  {
2558  KeyFrame* pKFi = *it;
2559  VertexPose * VP = new VertexPose(pKFi);
2560  VP->setId(pKFi->mnId);
2561  VP->setFixed(false);
2562  optimizer.addVertex(VP);
2563  }
2564 
2565  // Set Fixed KeyFrame vertices
2566  for(list<KeyFrame*>::iterator lit=lFixedKeyFrames.begin(), lend=lFixedKeyFrames.end(); lit!=lend; lit++)
2567  {
2568  KeyFrame* pKFi = *lit;
2569  VertexPose * VP = new VertexPose(pKFi);
2570  VP->setId(pKFi->mnId);
2571  VP->setFixed(true);
2572  optimizer.addVertex(VP);
2573 
2574  if(pKFi->bImu) // This should be done only for keyframe just before temporal window
2575  {
2576  VertexVelocity* VV = new VertexVelocity(pKFi);
2577  VV->setId(maxKFid+3*(pKFi->mnId)+1);
2578  VV->setFixed(true);
2579  optimizer.addVertex(VV);
2580  VertexGyroBias* VG = new VertexGyroBias(pKFi);
2581  VG->setId(maxKFid+3*(pKFi->mnId)+2);
2582  VG->setFixed(true);
2583  optimizer.addVertex(VG);
2584  VertexAccBias* VA = new VertexAccBias(pKFi);
2585  VA->setId(maxKFid+3*(pKFi->mnId)+3);
2586  VA->setFixed(true);
2587  optimizer.addVertex(VA);
2588  }
2589  }
2590 
2591  // Create intertial constraints
2592  vector<EdgeInertial*> vei(N,(EdgeInertial*)NULL);
2593  vector<EdgeGyroRW*> vegr(N,(EdgeGyroRW*)NULL);
2594  vector<EdgeAccRW*> vear(N,(EdgeAccRW*)NULL);
2595 
2596  for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
2597  {
2598  KeyFrame* pKFi = vpOptimizableKFs[i];
2599 
2600  if(!pKFi->mPrevKF)
2601  {
2602  cout << "NOT INERTIAL LINK TO PREVIOUS FRAME!!!!" << endl;
2603  continue;
2604  }
2605  if(pKFi->bImu && pKFi->mPrevKF->bImu && pKFi->mpImuPreintegrated)
2606  {
2607  pKFi->mpImuPreintegrated->SetNewBias(pKFi->mPrevKF->GetImuBias());
2608  g2o::HyperGraph::Vertex* VP1 = optimizer.vertex(pKFi->mPrevKF->mnId);
2609  g2o::HyperGraph::Vertex* VV1 = optimizer.vertex(maxKFid+3*(pKFi->mPrevKF->mnId)+1);
2610  g2o::HyperGraph::Vertex* VG1 = optimizer.vertex(maxKFid+3*(pKFi->mPrevKF->mnId)+2);
2611  g2o::HyperGraph::Vertex* VA1 = optimizer.vertex(maxKFid+3*(pKFi->mPrevKF->mnId)+3);
2612  g2o::HyperGraph::Vertex* VP2 = optimizer.vertex(pKFi->mnId);
2613  g2o::HyperGraph::Vertex* VV2 = optimizer.vertex(maxKFid+3*(pKFi->mnId)+1);
2614  g2o::HyperGraph::Vertex* VG2 = optimizer.vertex(maxKFid+3*(pKFi->mnId)+2);
2615  g2o::HyperGraph::Vertex* VA2 = optimizer.vertex(maxKFid+3*(pKFi->mnId)+3);
2616 
2617  if(!VP1 || !VV1 || !VG1 || !VA1 || !VP2 || !VV2 || !VG2 || !VA2)
2618  {
2619  cerr << "Error " << VP1 << ", "<< VV1 << ", "<< VG1 << ", "<< VA1 << ", " << VP2 << ", " << VV2 << ", "<< VG2 << ", "<< VA2 <<endl;
2620  continue;
2621  }
2622 
2623  vei[i] = new EdgeInertial(pKFi->mpImuPreintegrated);
2624 
2625  vei[i]->setVertex(0,dynamic_cast<g2o::OptimizableGraph::Vertex*>(VP1));
2626  vei[i]->setVertex(1,dynamic_cast<g2o::OptimizableGraph::Vertex*>(VV1));
2627  vei[i]->setVertex(2,dynamic_cast<g2o::OptimizableGraph::Vertex*>(VG1));
2628  vei[i]->setVertex(3,dynamic_cast<g2o::OptimizableGraph::Vertex*>(VA1));
2629  vei[i]->setVertex(4,dynamic_cast<g2o::OptimizableGraph::Vertex*>(VP2));
2630  vei[i]->setVertex(5,dynamic_cast<g2o::OptimizableGraph::Vertex*>(VV2));
2631 
2632  if(i==N-1 || bRecInit)
2633  {
2634  // All inertial residuals are included without robust cost function, but not that one linking the
2635  // last optimizable keyframe inside of the local window and the first fixed keyframe out. The
2636  // information matrix for this measurement is also downweighted. This is done to avoid accumulating
2637  // error due to fixing variables.
2638  g2o::RobustKernelHuber* rki = new g2o::RobustKernelHuber;
2639  vei[i]->setRobustKernel(rki);
2640  if(i==N-1)
2641  vei[i]->setInformation(vei[i]->information()*1e-2);
2642  rki->setDelta(sqrt(16.92));
2643  }
2644  optimizer.addEdge(vei[i]);
2645 
2646  vegr[i] = new EdgeGyroRW();
2647  vegr[i]->setVertex(0,VG1);
2648  vegr[i]->setVertex(1,VG2);
2649  Eigen::Matrix3d InfoG = pKFi->mpImuPreintegrated->C.block<3,3>(9,9).cast<double>().inverse();
2650  vegr[i]->setInformation(InfoG);
2651  optimizer.addEdge(vegr[i]);
2652 
2653  vear[i] = new EdgeAccRW();
2654  vear[i]->setVertex(0,VA1);
2655  vear[i]->setVertex(1,VA2);
2656  Eigen::Matrix3d InfoA = pKFi->mpImuPreintegrated->C.block<3,3>(12,12).cast<double>().inverse();
2657  vear[i]->setInformation(InfoA);
2658 
2659  optimizer.addEdge(vear[i]);
2660  }
2661  else
2662  cout << "ERROR building inertial edge" << endl;
2663  }
2664 
2665  // Set MapPoint vertices
2666  const int nExpectedSize = (N+lFixedKeyFrames.size())*lLocalMapPoints.size();
2667 
2668  // Mono
2669  vector<EdgeMono*> vpEdgesMono;
2670  vpEdgesMono.reserve(nExpectedSize);
2671 
2672  vector<KeyFrame*> vpEdgeKFMono;
2673  vpEdgeKFMono.reserve(nExpectedSize);
2674 
2675  vector<MapPoint*> vpMapPointEdgeMono;
2676  vpMapPointEdgeMono.reserve(nExpectedSize);
2677 
2678  // Stereo
2679  vector<EdgeStereo*> vpEdgesStereo;
2680  vpEdgesStereo.reserve(nExpectedSize);
2681 
2682  vector<KeyFrame*> vpEdgeKFStereo;
2683  vpEdgeKFStereo.reserve(nExpectedSize);
2684 
2685  vector<MapPoint*> vpMapPointEdgeStereo;
2686  vpMapPointEdgeStereo.reserve(nExpectedSize);
2687 
2688 
2689 
2690  const float thHuberMono = sqrt(5.991);
2691  const float chi2Mono2 = 5.991;
2692  const float thHuberStereo = sqrt(7.815);
2693  const float chi2Stereo2 = 7.815;
2694 
2695  const unsigned long iniMPid = maxKFid*5;
2696 
2697  map<int,int> mVisEdges;
2698  for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
2699  {
2700  KeyFrame* pKFi = vpOptimizableKFs[i];
2701  mVisEdges[pKFi->mnId] = 0;
2702  }
2703  for(list<KeyFrame*>::iterator lit=lFixedKeyFrames.begin(), lend=lFixedKeyFrames.end(); lit!=lend; lit++)
2704  {
2705  mVisEdges[(*lit)->mnId] = 0;
2706  }
2707 
2708  for(list<MapPoint*>::iterator lit=lLocalMapPoints.begin(), lend=lLocalMapPoints.end(); lit!=lend; lit++)
2709  {
2710  MapPoint* pMP = *lit;
2711  g2o::VertexSBAPointXYZ* vPoint = new g2o::VertexSBAPointXYZ();
2712  vPoint->setEstimate(pMP->GetWorldPos().cast<double>());
2713 
2714  unsigned long id = pMP->mnId+iniMPid+1;
2715  vPoint->setId(id);
2716  vPoint->setMarginalized(true);
2717  optimizer.addVertex(vPoint);
2718  const map<KeyFrame*,tuple<int,int>> observations = pMP->GetObservations();
2719 
2720  // Create visual constraints
2721  for(map<KeyFrame*,tuple<int,int>>::const_iterator mit=observations.begin(), mend=observations.end(); mit!=mend; mit++)
2722  {
2723  KeyFrame* pKFi = mit->first;
2724 
2725  if(pKFi->mnBALocalForKF!=pKF->mnId && pKFi->mnBAFixedForKF!=pKF->mnId)
2726  continue;
2727 
2728  if(!pKFi->isBad() && pKFi->GetMap() == pCurrentMap)
2729  {
2730  const int leftIndex = get<0>(mit->second);
2731 
2732  cv::KeyPoint kpUn;
2733 
2734  // Monocular left observation
2735  if(leftIndex != -1 && pKFi->mvuRight[leftIndex]<0)
2736  {
2737  mVisEdges[pKFi->mnId]++;
2738 
2739  kpUn = pKFi->mvKeysUn[leftIndex];
2740  Eigen::Matrix<double,2,1> obs;
2741  obs << kpUn.pt.x, kpUn.pt.y;
2742 
2743  EdgeMono* e = new EdgeMono(0);
2744 
2745  e->setVertex(0, dynamic_cast<g2o::OptimizableGraph::Vertex*>(optimizer.vertex(id)));
2746  e->setVertex(1, dynamic_cast<g2o::OptimizableGraph::Vertex*>(optimizer.vertex(pKFi->mnId)));
2747  e->setMeasurement(obs);
2748 
2749  // Add here uncerteinty
2750  const float unc2 = pKFi->mpCamera->uncertainty2(obs);
2751 
2752  const float &invSigma2 = pKFi->mvInvLevelSigma2[kpUn.octave]/unc2;
2753  e->setInformation(Eigen::Matrix2d::Identity()*invSigma2);
2754 
2755  g2o::RobustKernelHuber* rk = new g2o::RobustKernelHuber;
2756  e->setRobustKernel(rk);
2757  rk->setDelta(thHuberMono);
2758 
2759  optimizer.addEdge(e);
2760  vpEdgesMono.push_back(e);
2761  vpEdgeKFMono.push_back(pKFi);
2762  vpMapPointEdgeMono.push_back(pMP);
2763  }
2764  // Stereo-observation
2765  else if(leftIndex != -1)// Stereo observation
2766  {
2767  kpUn = pKFi->mvKeysUn[leftIndex];
2768  mVisEdges[pKFi->mnId]++;
2769 
2770  const float kp_ur = pKFi->mvuRight[leftIndex];
2771  Eigen::Matrix<double,3,1> obs;
2772  obs << kpUn.pt.x, kpUn.pt.y, kp_ur;
2773 
2774  EdgeStereo* e = new EdgeStereo(0);
2775 
2776  e->setVertex(0, dynamic_cast<g2o::OptimizableGraph::Vertex*>(optimizer.vertex(id)));
2777  e->setVertex(1, dynamic_cast<g2o::OptimizableGraph::Vertex*>(optimizer.vertex(pKFi->mnId)));
2778  e->setMeasurement(obs);
2779 
2780  // Add here uncerteinty
2781  const float unc2 = pKFi->mpCamera->uncertainty2(obs.head(2));
2782 
2783  const float &invSigma2 = pKFi->mvInvLevelSigma2[kpUn.octave]/unc2;
2784  e->setInformation(Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity()*invSigma2);
2785 
2786  g2o::RobustKernelHuber* rk = new g2o::RobustKernelHuber;
2787  e->setRobustKernel(rk);
2788  rk->setDelta(thHuberStereo);
2789 
2790  optimizer.addEdge(e);
2791  vpEdgesStereo.push_back(e);
2792  vpEdgeKFStereo.push_back(pKFi);
2793  vpMapPointEdgeStereo.push_back(pMP);
2794  }
2795 
2796  // Monocular right observation
2797  if(pKFi->mpCamera2){
2798  int rightIndex = get<1>(mit->second);
2799 
2800  if(rightIndex != -1 ){
2801  rightIndex -= pKFi->NLeft;
2802  mVisEdges[pKFi->mnId]++;
2803 
2804  Eigen::Matrix<double,2,1> obs;
2805  cv::KeyPoint kp = pKFi->mvKeysRight[rightIndex];
2806  obs << kp.pt.x, kp.pt.y;
2807 
2808  EdgeMono* e = new EdgeMono(1);
2809 
2810  e->setVertex(0, dynamic_cast<g2o::OptimizableGraph::Vertex*>(optimizer.vertex(id)));
2811  e->setVertex(1, dynamic_cast<g2o::OptimizableGraph::Vertex*>(optimizer.vertex(pKFi->mnId)));
2812  e->setMeasurement(obs);
2813 
2814  // Add here uncerteinty
2815  const float unc2 = pKFi->mpCamera->uncertainty2(obs);
2816 
2817  const float &invSigma2 = pKFi->mvInvLevelSigma2[kpUn.octave]/unc2;
2818  e->setInformation(Eigen::Matrix2d::Identity()*invSigma2);
2819 
2820  g2o::RobustKernelHuber* rk = new g2o::RobustKernelHuber;
2821  e->setRobustKernel(rk);
2822  rk->setDelta(thHuberMono);
2823 
2824  optimizer.addEdge(e);
2825  vpEdgesMono.push_back(e);
2826  vpEdgeKFMono.push_back(pKFi);
2827  vpMapPointEdgeMono.push_back(pMP);
2828  }
2829  }
2830  }
2831  }
2832  }
2833 
2834  //cout << "Total map points: " << lLocalMapPoints.size() << endl;
2835  for(map<int,int>::iterator mit=mVisEdges.begin(), mend=mVisEdges.end(); mit!=mend; mit++)
2836  {
2837  assert(mit->second>=3);
2838  }
2839 
2840  optimizer.initializeOptimization();
2841  optimizer.computeActiveErrors();
2842  float err = optimizer.activeRobustChi2();
2843  optimizer.optimize(opt_it); // Originally to 2
2844  float err_end = optimizer.activeRobustChi2();
2845  if(pbStopFlag)
2846  optimizer.setForceStopFlag(pbStopFlag);
2847 
2848  vector<pair<KeyFrame*,MapPoint*> > vToErase;
2849  vToErase.reserve(vpEdgesMono.size()+vpEdgesStereo.size());
2850 
2851  // Check inlier observations
2852  // Mono
2853  for(size_t i=0, iend=vpEdgesMono.size(); i<iend;i++)
2854  {
2855  EdgeMono* e = vpEdgesMono[i];
2856  MapPoint* pMP = vpMapPointEdgeMono[i];
2857  bool bClose = pMP->mTrackDepth<10.f;
2858 
2859  if(pMP->isBad())
2860  continue;
2861 
2862  if((e->chi2()>chi2Mono2 && !bClose) || (e->chi2()>1.5f*chi2Mono2 && bClose) || !e->isDepthPositive())
2863  {
2864  KeyFrame* pKFi = vpEdgeKFMono[i];
2865  vToErase.push_back(make_pair(pKFi,pMP));
2866  }
2867  }
2868 
2869 
2870  // Stereo
2871  for(size_t i=0, iend=vpEdgesStereo.size(); i<iend;i++)
2872  {
2873  EdgeStereo* e = vpEdgesStereo[i];
2874  MapPoint* pMP = vpMapPointEdgeStereo[i];
2875 
2876  if(pMP->isBad())
2877  continue;
2878 
2879  if(e->chi2()>chi2Stereo2)
2880  {
2881  KeyFrame* pKFi = vpEdgeKFStereo[i];
2882  vToErase.push_back(make_pair(pKFi,pMP));
2883  }
2884  }
2885 
2886  // Get Map Mutex and erase outliers
2887  unique_lock<mutex> lock(pMap->mMutexMapUpdate);
2888 
2889 
2890  // TODO: Some convergence problems have been detected here
2891  if((2*err < err_end || isnan(err) || isnan(err_end)) && !bLarge) //bGN)
2892  {
2893  cout << "FAIL LOCAL-INERTIAL BA!!!!" << endl;
2894  return;
2895  }
2896 
2897 
2898 
2899  if(!vToErase.empty())
2900  {
2901  for(size_t i=0;i<vToErase.size();i++)
2902  {
2903  KeyFrame* pKFi = vToErase[i].first;
2904  MapPoint* pMPi = vToErase[i].second;
2905  pKFi->EraseMapPointMatch(pMPi);
2906  pMPi->EraseObservation(pKFi);
2907  }
2908  }
2909 
2910  for(list<KeyFrame*>::iterator lit=lFixedKeyFrames.begin(), lend=lFixedKeyFrames.end(); lit!=lend; lit++)
2911  (*lit)->mnBAFixedForKF = 0;
2912 
2913  // Recover optimized data
2914  // Local temporal Keyframes
2915  N=vpOptimizableKFs.size();
2916  for(int i=0; i<N; i++)
2917  {
2918  KeyFrame* pKFi = vpOptimizableKFs[i];
2919 
2920  VertexPose* VP = static_cast<VertexPose*>(optimizer.vertex(pKFi->mnId));
2921  Sophus::SE3f Tcw(VP->estimate().Rcw[0].cast<float>(), VP->estimate().tcw[0].cast<float>());
2922  pKFi->SetPose(Tcw);

962  else {

964

993  }
994  }

997  return 0;
998 
999  // We perform 4 optimizations, after each optimization we classify observation as inlier/outlier
1000  // At the next optimization, outliers are not included, but at the end they can be classified as inliers again.
1001  const float chi2Mono[4]={5.991,5.991,5.991,5.991};
1002  const float chi2Stereo[4]={7.815,7.815,7.815, 7.815};
1003  const int its[4]={10,10,10,10};
1004

1006  for(size_t it=0; it<4; it++)
1007  {

1012  optimizer.optimize(its[it]);

1018

1022  {
1023  e->computeError();
1024  }

1027

1033  }

1038  }

1108  g2o::SE3Quat SE3quat_recov = vSE3_recov->estimate();
